title: Header Navigation Responsive and Functionality
description: Verify the fixed header navigation menu is responsive across devices, the logo displays correctly, mobile menu toggles open and close correctly, and all navigation links produce smooth scrolling to corresponding sections.

steps.description: Load homepage on desktop screen
Verify header is fixed and visible
Click each navigation link
Confirm smooth scroll to corresponding section
Resize viewport to mobile size
Verify mobile menu toggle button is visible
Click the mobile menu toggle button to open menu
Verify menu items are displayed
Click the toggle button again to close the menu
Verify menu is hidden

title: Hero Section Display and Animation
description: Check that the hero section loads fully on desktop and mobile, displays the title, subtitle, CTA buttons, background image, and animated statistics with scroll indicator functioning correctly.

steps.description: Load homepage on desktop and mobile devices
Verify hero title and subtitle text are visible
Verify background image loads properly
Verify animated statistics count up on page load
Verify CTA buttons are visible and clickable
Click each CTA button
Verify expected navigation or page action triggered
Verify scroll indicator is visible and scrolls user down on click

title: About Section Animations and Hover Effects
description: Confirm the About section's story and values cards display correct content, animations play on load, and hover effects trigger as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to the About section on homepage
Verify story and values cards content matches specification
Observe cards for entrance animations on scroll into view
Hover mouse over each card
Verify card hover animations and effects trigger smoothly

title: Services Section Modal Content and Booking Link
description: Verify clicking any service category card opens a modal with accurate service details, prices and a functional 'Book Service' link that navigates to booking section.

steps.description: Scroll to Services section
Click each service category card one by one
Modal opens with correct service listings and pricing
Verify modal content matches expected services for selected category
Click 'Book Service' button inside modal
Confirm navigation or scroll to Booking section
Close modal and repeat for all categories

title: Gallery Load, Lazy Loading, Hover Overlay and Instagram Link
description: Validate the gallery loads images dynamically via API, lazy loads images correctly, shows hover overlays with Instagram icon, and clicking images opens Instagram properly.

steps.description: Navigate to Gallery section
Verify images load in a responsive grid layout
Scroll down to trigger lazy loading for images outside initial viewport
Verify images load progressively as scrolled into view
Hover over individual gallery images
Verify Instagram icon overlay appears smoothly
Click on Instagram icon overlay or image
Confirm Instagram web page opens in a new browser tab

title: Reviews Carousel Auto-Rotation and Manual Navigation
description: Ensure the reviews carousel cycles testimonials automatically, manual navigation buttons work, unique avatars and star ratings display correctly across all 57 testimonials.

steps.description: Navigate to Reviews section
Verify review cards display unique avatars and corresponding star ratings
Observe carousel auto-rotation through multiple testimonials
Click manual navigation arrows or pagination controls
Verify carousel changes to selected testimonial immediately
Test carousel cycles through all 57 reviews without repeats or errors

title: Booking Form Validation and WhatsApp Integration
description: Check that the booking form enforces all required fields, validates date/time constraints (no Sundays, limited hours), service selection works, and that submission opens a correctly formatted WhatsApp pre-filled message. Confirm form resets after submission.

steps.description: Navigate to Booking section
Attempt to submit the form with no input
Verify validation errors present for all required fields
Input invalid date (Sunday) and/or time outside allowed hours
Verify date/time validation error messages displayed
Fill form with valid date/time, select a valid service, and enter all required info
Submit the form
Confirm WhatsApp opens with pre-filled message summarizing the booking details accurately
Verify booking form is reset to initial state after submission

title: Contact Section Links and Responsive Map
description: Verify contact info displays correct business details, phone and email links are clickable and launch default apps, and embedded Google Map is responsive on all devices.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact section
Verify displayed business info matches specification
Click phone number link
Confirm the system initiates call or dialer app
Click email link
Verify system launches mail client with correct recipient
Verify Google Map loads and is visible
Resize viewport to multiple sizes
Confirm map scales responsively and remains functional

title: FAQ Accordion Expand/Collapse and Keyboard Navigation
description: Ensure FAQ items expand and collapse properly with smooth animations on click, and that keyboard navigation (tab, enter, space) can open and close FAQ items to comply with accessibility requirements.

steps.description: Navigate to FAQ section
Click on each FAQ question
Verify answer expands with smooth animation
Click again on the same question
Confirm answer collapses smoothly
Use keyboard tab key to focus FAQ questions
Press Enter and Space keys on focused items
Verify questions expand or collapse accordingly

title: Footer Links and Policy Modals Functionality
description: Check that footer links and social media icons navigate correctly, and that privacy policy and terms modals open, display content, and close properly on all devices.

steps.description: Scroll to footer
Click each site link in footer
Confirm navigation or expected page section appearance
Click each social media icon
Verify respective social media page opens in new tab
Click privacy policy and terms links to open modals
Confirm modals open with full content displayed
Click close button or outside modal area
Verify modals close smoothly

title: Cookie Consent Banner Display and Persistence
description: Verify cookie consent banner appears on first visit, allows toggling optional cookies categories, saves preferences in localStorage, and does not reappear on subsequent visits.

steps.description: Clear browser cookies and localStorage
Load homepage
Verify cookie consent banner is visible
Toggle different cookie categories on and off
Confirm toggles update states correctly
Accept or save cookie preferences
Verify banner disappears
Reload or revisit site
Confirm banner does not reappear due to saved preferences

title: Performance and Accessibility Validation
description: Test overall website load time meets performance targets, images are optimized and lazy loaded, animations run smoothly, and accessibility features (keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, focus rings, reduced motion support) conform to WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

steps.description: Conduct performance test using Lighthouse or equivalent
Verify site loads within target time and images are optimized
Confirm lazy loading triggers correctly during scroll
Validate animations are smooth and non-janky
Test full keyboard navigation through interactive elements
Verify focus indicators are visible and ARIA labels exist where appropriate
Enable user preference for reduced motion
Confirm animations are reduced or disabled in compliance
